title: Apple’s 35W dual-port charger is finally down to a price we can easily recommend
content:
Macworld

With Black Friday just days away, the Apple 35W dual USB-C power adapter just dropped to its best price ever, making it available for purchase for $39, a solid $20 under its $59 MSRP. As we all know, Apple’s accessories can be a bit overpriced, but this deal gives it a price that we can truly recommend.

Aside from the discount, there are plenty of other benefits to getting this one right now. First of all, this is perfect for all your travels because it’s not only fairly compact, but it also comes with a neat compact design with foldable prongs This model features two USB-C ports and we love the downward-facing design that keeps cables neatly organized.

Speaking of cables, you can charge two devices at once. So you can keep your iPhone, iPad, AirPods, and Apple Watches all charged up as well as a MacBook Air. Just note, the 35W capacity isn’t quite high enough to charge a MacBook Pro.

Don’t miss out on getting the Apple power adapter for its best price this Black Friday and get one for just $39 at Amazon.

Buy now at Amazon
